settings.title: Broadway Jewellers
settings.paragraph:
Broadway Jewellers provides a wide range of branded watches, Jewellery and accessories. They strive every day to earn the confidence and trust of their clients by exceeding their expectations of quality, service, and value.

Our work with Broadway Jewellers starting with migrating their site form WordPress to Shopify, we also covered an array of aspects from inventory management, digital marketing, SEO web solutions, web design upgrade to custom API solutions.
settings.list:
Store Migration

Shopify Web Development

Custom Features Development

Custom App Integrations

Monthly SEO & Site maintenance support

settings.title: From problem to solution
settings.paragraph: How we overcome Broadway Jewellers challenges to migrate their store from WordPress to Shopify and having an updated store design and content flow to showcase their large amount of inventory. We continuously worked with them to increase site visits, engagement, and product purchases.

settings.pre_title: Starting off the journey to Success
settings.title: Migration & Development
settings.paragraph:
When we started the project with Broadway Jewellers. We first needed to understand the information and data that needed to be sorted through and migrated to the Shopify platform from WordPress. Our team did an extensive analysis and created a strategic plan that ensured the old website's SEO, content, and web rankings were kept intact during the migration.


With the content migration complete, our team started developing the Shopify website according to our clients’ needs while taking to account the key functions and features required for website.

settings.title: SEO & Site Maintenance
settings.paragraph: After a successful website build and launch. We worked on optimizing their websites and a monthly maintenance plan. Our team worked on creating monthly plans on improving and optimization our client’s website. They continually use and develop cutting-edge SEO tools and crawling software to identify and analyze technical SEO factors that needs to be addressed. They also worked on product content research and creation. Consistently working on the website and keeping up to date with the ever-evolving online environment.
settings.list:
Website data backup

Stand by for website queries or requests

Website updates and customizations

Evaluating current keyword rankings

Identifying and creating quality links

Content research & creation

Product content quality analysis and update

settings.pre_title: Working on targeting the right audience
settings.title: Google & Social Media Ads
settings.paragraph: When we first took over the client’s social ad campaigns, one of the biggest challenges was finding the people interested in its products. The company’s target audience of jewellery and watches was so broad at that time. Our team performed several campaign audits and market analyses to quickly determine the client’s ideal target market, drive website purchases and deliver a solid return.
settings.list:
Audience AB testing

Promoting highest-priority products

Monthly ad goals and review

Special occasions & dates campaigns

Product placement ads

settings.title: We have worked with Broadway Jewellers on a number of unique features
settings.paragraph:
Our team of Shopify web developers work closely with our clients to
create a selection of suitable options, and unique features that perfectly
represent their vision and needs.

settings.title: Jewellery customizer
settings.paragraph: This Jewellery customizer helps users choose options to create their own personalized necklace, or bracelet by typing in their name, choosing the material, size, font style and language.

settings.title: Custom Filter Functionality
settings.paragraph: This Custom Filter Functionality was built to filter through the products with specific features related to product colour, gender, materials, and water resistance options.

settings.title: Product review app
settings.paragraph:
This integration helps increase the overall trust of visitors to the
store and increases conversion by showcasing ratings of the particular product.

settings.title: More to expect when working with us...

settings.title: Website Analysis
settings.paragraph: In depth testing for performance for key metrics such as speed, traffic, search engine optimization (SEO), and user experience.
settings.paragraph_old: Our team performs thorough site analysis to determine your website’s conversion opportunities, threats, weaknesses, and strengths. We run SEO audits, test your site speed and functionality, and analyse your site traffic. These methods allow us to improve your site usability and increase your site engagement and conversions.

settings.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
settings.paragraph: From A/B testing to UX analysis and design, we ensure all aspects of your website are optimized for conversion.
settings.paragraph_old: Our team focuses on optimizing your sites speed by eliminating unnecessary form fields, placing clear calls-to-action and simplifying your page navigations. We also perform A/B testing to ensure all aspects of your website are optimized for conversion.

settings.title: Preventative Maintenance
settings.paragraph: Regular site maintenance is crucial to ensure your site is running at its optimum. We also do scheduled site check-ups with backups.
settings.paragraph_old:
Regular site maintenance is crucial to ensure
your website is running at full capacity. We conduct scheduled site check-ups
to determine your website's key aspects that need improvement. Using the
analytics results, we develop strategies to enhance your site security, boost
your traffic and optimize your page experience.

settings.title: Project Communication
settings.paragraph: We take the time to regularly communicate to our clients keeping them updating on our processes and encourage feedback.
settings.paragraph_old: We focus on developing customized processes to fit your needs. We understand that each client is different and work in different ways. We take the time to regularly communicate to our clients keeping them updating on our processes and encourage feedback. For the convenience of our clients, our meetings/communications are done via email, whatsapp or video conferencing.

settings.title: We offer a large range of unique customizations and add ons
